it.polimi.se2019.server.model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.server.model.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents the player itself. Each player is identified by its clientName It has some attributes such as character, position, score... Each player has a reference to its playerboard, hand and match.
    Author:
    mattiamassarini, merklind, thisisferra.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:

      • getFinalFrenzy

        public int getFinalFrenzy()
        Getter of the final frenzy status. It's 0 when the final frenzy hasn't started yet, 1 if the final frenzy has started and the player has 1 move available 2 if the final frenzy has started and the player has 2 moves available.
        Returns:
        the int representing the final frenzy status.

      • setFinalFrenzy

        Parameters:

      • pickUpAmmo

        public void pickUpAmmo(Square currentSquare,
                       Match currentMatch)
        Modify the Hand of the player adding cubes and, if necessary, a powerup. If the player already has got three power-up nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        currentSquare - the current square of the player
        currentMatch - the match

      • pickUpPowerUp

        public void pickUpPowerUp()
        It picks up a power up only if the current power up array's size is less than three.

      • pickUpPowerUpToRespawn

        public PowerUp pickUpPowerUpToRespawn()
        It picks up a power up even if the current hand is three. Used when discarding a power up for spawning.
        Returns:
        the power up drawn.

      • pickUpWeapon

        public boolean pickUpWeapon(int indexToPickUp)
        Pick up a weapon in case the player has less than 3 weapons, it removes from the arsenal the weapon the player chose and add it to his hand. Additionally the player pay the right amount of cubes to buy the weapon.
        Parameters:
        indexToPickUp - index of the weaponsSlot array the players pick up the weapon from.
        Returns:
        true if the player can draw a weapon, false otherwise

      • pickUpWeapon

        public boolean pickUpWeapon(int indexToPickUp,
                            int indexToSwitch)
        Pick up a weapon in case the player has more than 3 weapons, it removes from the arsenal the weapon the player chose and add it to his hand. The player pays the right amount of cubes to buy the weapon. The player put a weapon of his choice back inside the same cabinet he picked up the chosen weapons from. The returned weapon is loaded.
        Parameters:
        indexToPickUp - index of the weaponsSlot array the players pick up the weapon from.
        indexToSwitch - index of the weapon to be returned.
        Returns:
        true if the player can draw a weapon, false otherwise

      • tradeCube

        public void tradeCube(int index)
        Trade a power up with a cube of the same color.

      • checkDeath

        public boolean checkDeath()
        Check how many damages a player has got. If he has 11 or 12 damages he is dead
        Returns:
        true if the player has got 11 or 12 damages, false otherwise.

      • addPoints

        public void addPoints(int pointsGained)
        Add points to the current points.
        Parameters:
        pointsGained - is the score the player has gained

      • chooseCharacter

        public java.lang.String chooseCharacter()

      • getReloadableWeapons

        public java.util.ArrayList<Weapon> getReloadableWeapons()
        It finds the list of weapons the player can actually reload, taking into account the number of cubes the player has, the number of cubes needed in order to pay the reload cost and if the weapon is loaded or not.
        Returns:
        a subset of weapons that the player has and that can be reloaded.

      • getPlayerDead

        public boolean getPlayerDead()
        Getter of the playerdead status.
        Returns:
        if the player is currently dead or not.

      • setPlayerDead

        Setter of the playerDead field.
        Parameters:
        playerDead - true if the player died, false otherwise.

      • toJSON

        public org.json.simple.JSONObject toJSON()
        It saves the status of the player into a JSONObject object.
        Returns:
        the JSONObject containing all the information in order to resume the player.

      • setSuspended

        public void setSuspended(boolean suspended)
        Setter of the suspended field.
        Parameters:
        suspended - true if the player is suspended, false otherwise.

      • getTypePlayerBoard

        public int getTypePlayerBoard()
        Getter method of the typePlayerBoard field.
        Returns:
        the number type of the playerboard. 0 is the normal type, 1 the final frenzy type.

      • setTypePlayerBoard

        public void setTypePlayerBoard(int typePlayerBoard)
        Method called to setUp the final frenzy boards, according to the rules.
        Parameters:
        typePlayerBoard - the number type of the playerboard. 0 is the normal type, 1 the final frenzy type.

      • getFirstSpawn

        public boolean getFirstSpawn()

        Returns:
        if the player is spawning for the first time or not.

      • setFirstSpawn

        Setter method of the firstSpawn field.
        Parameters:
        firstSpawn - true if the player hasn't spawned yet, false otherwise.

      • getLastDamagingPlayers

        public java.util.HashSet<Player> getLastDamagingPlayers()
        Getter of the lastDamagingPlayer list
        Returns:
        the player collection containing all the player who attacked you from the player last turn to the current.
